income_messages:
From: r********s@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-08 17:07:01
SUBJECT:   Dear Sir/Madam,
  Dear Sir/Madam,
Finaprets is a credito institution licensed as a financial company and Società di Crédit Foncier. A wholly-owned subsidiary of Crédit Foncier, its purpose is to finance business loans, mortgage loans, project funding and development of direct financing of the business with the BPCE Group. It grants or acquires guaranteed loans or exposures to public entities, and finances them by issuing obligations property, which are France legal covered bonds. The company was incorporated in 1998 and is based in Saint-Quentin, France.
- Want to be an Agent / Broker?
- Investments Offer?
- Do you need a Loan?
- Do you seek an Insurance Coverage Loan?
Intermediaries/Consultants/Brokers are welcome to bring their clients and are 100% protected. Do you need financial assistance? We can help you?. Apply now for a 2% loan. Kindly contact us for more information to procure the loan financial services.
For more details, please contact us directly.
Sincerely,
Mr. Laurens Françoys
Rachat de crédit Finaprets   
From: r********s@gmail.com
To: qk84574@m**************m
Time: 2023-04-08 18:08:33
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Sir/Madam,
Dear Sir,
Thanks for your response. We really appreciate it, kindly tell us what
exactly you need. Can we help?
Waiting for your swift response.
Sincerely,
Mr. Laurens Françoys
Rachat de crédit Finaprets
info.finaprets@tech-center.com
-- 
FINAPRETS  Created on 1 October 2004, Rachat de Crédit Finapretse is a
company with a capital of € 2 Billion Euros having its registered office at
74 Boulevard Henri Martin, 02100 Saint-Quentin and registered with the
Trade and Companies Avignon under number TVA FR 85419446034 Rachat de
crédit Registration No:TVA FR 85419446034 (www.finaprets.com) as a broker
banking and payment services (CIOB) and agent of an insurance broker
Unifine Insure SpA. FINAPRETS Aix en Provence Founded on 2000.Rachat de
Crédit Finaprets 13 is a company with a capital funding project across the
countries.

From: r********s@gmail.com
To: qk84574@m**************m
Time: 2023-04-08 19:44:35
SUBJECT: OUR LOAN PROCEDURES
Dear Sir,
This is to acknowledge the receipt of your mail and as a way of
introduction. We, the administrative Officer of* Rachat de crédit Finaprets*,
is confidentially offer financial freedom to serious clients world wide and
our service is open to Individuals, Firms and Corporate Bodies regardless
of their Marital Status, Sex, Religion, and LOCATION and must have a legal
means of repaying back the Loan at the stipulated time. Applicants must be
30 years and above. AND MUST BE TRUSTWORTHY.
To continue with your application, please make sure the following apply.
1. You are 30 years and above.
2. You have a regular income that will enable you to meet up with the
monthly repayment.
3. You do not have a history of bad record (in other words, county court
judgments).
4. You have a Bank or building society account where you can pay back your
debts directly.
Be informed that the refund policy has a grace period One Year before
repayment starts and the refund period depends on the duration of the loan
as would be indicated on the loan application form. And our interest rate
is *2**.0%* per yearly repayment.
Please notices that the required documents needed to process your loan are
as follows;
i. Filled application form that would be sent to you as soon as we receive
your loan information
ii. Signed contracts and agreements that would be sent to you upon receipt
of copy application form filled
iii. Either of the following forms of identity would be sent across to us;
*(a) International Passport.(b) Driver's License.(c) Working Identity Card.*
As soon as all paperwork is filled, signed and returned for official
documentation, and you are is in consensus with our Terms of Service, the
stipulated transaction would be completed at least 3 working days.
We wish to inform you that, we do not charge upfront fees (either
application fee or commitment fee) as the fees are fully paid by us but you
will be required to insure your loan at an Insurance company against any
eventuality and when you are unable to repay the loan in full, the
Insurance company will be held responsible by this firm.
Please *Notice*, the Insurance Policy is needed to secure this transaction
against any unforeseen circumstances that might arise should you fail to
repay back the loan because the Insurance Policy Bond serves as a
collateral to secure the transaction for both parties (lender and borrower)
and risk free. Therefore, you are only paying for *Legal Protection
Insurance (LPI) Fees* which shall be paid directly to the insurance
company to enable them to issue the Insurance Policy for use as collateral
to insure/secure your loan for approval on your behalf. And as soon as your
loan funds are secure and approved then we will quickly transfer your bank
(Banking Institution) to initiate the wire transfer of your loan into your
designated bank account and surely within 72 hours time receive your loan
safely at your designated bank account.
We the "*Rachat de crédit Finaprets*" acting with full corporate
responsibility, state with full legal responsibility that we are 100%
ready, willing and able to fund your Business / Investment loans but
provided you are in consensus with our terms of service (TOS). To enable us
to proceed to the next phase of your application, kindly forward either
your ""*Business Plan*"" or ""*Letter of Intent*"" to provide us with
details about your project review and the type of Collateral you have to
secure this loan.
In conclusion, acknowledge the receipt of this mail and get back to us with
any further questions which you feel need more explanation so we can
forward our Loan Application Form to you.
Awaiting your swift response as that will determine how fast this
transaction will be completed and closed.
Sincerely,
Mr. Laurens Françoys
Rachat de crédit Finaprets
info.finaprets@tech-center.com
